model_answer: The video showing the labeled telescope projection setup is most likely found in option A: [00:03:24 - 00:04:14]. This is because the description matches the setup described in the audio where the narrator discusses using inexpensive eyepieces, a circular card mask, and a cloth to create a simple and effective telescope projection setup.

The answer is A: [00:07:39 - 00:08:14]. The bold blue-screen warning reading “NEVER use eyepiece solar filters” appears at 00:07:39, and it is accompanied by close-ups of a filter labeled “SUN” and a cracked “SUN GLASS” filter from 00:08:10 to 00:08:14. The speaker also emphasizes not to use eyepiece solar filters in this segment and references a companion video showing what can happen if they are used.
